name: OnObjectMoved
notes: SetObjectPos does not work when used in this callback. To fix it, recreate the object.
description: This callback is called when an object is moved after MoveObject (when it stops moving).

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object that was moved

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_fn:
MoveObject: Move an object.
 MovePlayerObject: Move a player object.
 IsObjectMoving: Check if the object is moving.
 StopObject: Stop an object from moving.
 OnPlayerObjectMoved: Called when a player-object stops moving.
related_cb: OnPlayerObjectMoved: Called when a player-object stops moving.
